original_title: Blur: Showtime – Live at Alexandra Palace 7 October 1994
overview: Showtime is a video recording by British rock band Blur, released in February 1995. Directed and edited by Matthew Longfellow and produced by Ceri Levy, the film is a recording of the band's gig at Alexandra Palace, London, England on 7 October 1994.
title: Blur: Showtime – Live at Alexandra Palace 7 October 1994
